section.title: Fulfilling a Request
section.para: After a request has been approved, CloudForms Management Engine then goes through the steps required to complete the request. The steps followed for a regular provision from a virtual machine to a virtual machine (not to a template) are found by navigating to AutomateExplorer, then listed under DOMAINCloud|InfrastructureVMProvisioningVMProvision_VMProvision VM from Template (template) instance. The value for each state shows where the instance resides in the Datastore accordion. The default set of execution steps is shown below. For more information on state machines, see .
